001: The sheds are empty and suffered heavily from vandalism.
002: There is nothing to see actually.
003: When I walked here I saw someone walking outside. I didn't really bother, I was quite safe and silent. The man looked old, so I started to think and decided to take a look. There was a house and a someones back garden next to the factory halls.
004: So I took the time to take some photo's before I left.
006: Close the doors! Knock please. So I closed the door when I left.
